#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int countSetBits(int n)
{
  int count = 0;
  while(n)
  {
    count += n & 1;
    n >>= 1;
  }
  return count;
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;

        int sum = 0;
        for(int i=1; i<=n; i++)
            sum += countSetBits(i);

        cout<<sum<<endl;
    }
}
